name: Hapi
headline: Stocks and cryptos trading app with zero commissions and no minimumsâ¦
description:
Hapi democratizes investing for consumers in Latin America.

We let anyone from Latam easily invest in stocks, ETFs and cryptos in under 5 minutes, with no minimums and no commissions.

founders.name: Dusko Kelez, Founder
founders.description:
CoFounder and CEO at Hapi, investments app focused in consumers from Latin America.
Former COO at Grin Scooters and COO at Taximo. Former founder and CEO at DUKE Clothing, Mambo and Club J. Started his career in advisory at PwC and private equity at Nexus Group. Bachelor in Economic Sciences by Pacific University, and has studies of Computer Science for business professionals at Harvard.

founders.name: Piero Sifuentes, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder and CTO at Hapi 
Software Engineer, passionate about new technologies, start-ups and new products.
Ex Rappi, Royal Caribbean - Globant, BBVA

# ‍**Start your investmentportfolio from LATAM**
Stocks, ETFs and cryptoNo broker commissions, no minimums*
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/66c82be05048f7c815ff41a0_check-circle.svg)
¡Muchas gracias por subscribirte!
Oops, Algo salio mal, recarga la página y vuelve a intentar.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/66a3e16e9bd072ff4970ed14_circle-info.svg)
Stocks and ETFs offered by Hapi Securities LLC. Crypto is offered through Bakkt Crypto.Some fees may apply, click [Fee schedule](https://hapi.trade/<https:/hapi-public-documents.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/hapi-fees-schedule.pdf>) for more details.
![Invierte en la Bolsa de E.E.U.U desde Latam con Hapi](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/66a118746e6a16169cab3619_Img-banner-home-landing.png)
![AriseHealth logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/66a115c33f3e6d8aca68b574_logo_forbes_yxcmjx.png)![OE logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/66a115c30c6931009e3a7edc_logo_techcrunch_psagjt.png)![2020INC logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/66a115c3b220b41f19532657_logo_bloomberg.png)![The Paak logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/66a115c5a6a34fe76601b581_logo_gestion_jgexj2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667ba60c37af0320158519e9_Hapi-logo.png)
[Download app](https://hapi.trade/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hapicorp.imhapi>)
## Invest in the stock market easily and safely!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667b1d195157d5d7f202b8d0_Open-ilu.png)
### **Your account in minutes**
Sign up and start investing today from wherever you are.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667b1d1a24cc2612406db492_Deposit-ilu.png)
### **Instant deposits**
Transfer money directly from your account and have your funds quickly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667b1d1be034441e1c196b05_Dinero-seguro-ilu.png)
### **Invest confidently**
The technology of our platform ensures superior security and reliability.
**Download now!**
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667ba23d9f68fb7e941fad81_Vectors-Wrapper.svg) iOS](https://hapi.trade/<https:/apps.apple.com/app/hapi-finance/id1532828502>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667ba23e03bddb6faca5dbeb_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)Android](https://hapi.trade/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hapicorp.imhapi>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/66a3e5b2bee73d5f718e1cf8_huawei-logo.svg)Huawei](https://hapi.trade/<https:/appgallery.huawei.com/app/C104387781>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667ba21c164e4169768956eb_Image.png)
## Invest any**amount you want**
Start you investment portfolio with the amount you want. You can invest from US$5 in fractional shares, ETF or crypto.
Crypto is offered through Bakkt Crypto.
## Crypto**24 hours a day**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667ba21d4aa5805320e65262_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
Crypto Risk Disclosures. Crypto is offered through Apex Crypto LLC.
17 cryptocurrencies available including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Dogecoin (DOGE), and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667ba21d8899206d250af4cf_Image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667ba21e7de10e06cd77a15a_Image.png)
## **Broker Dealer** Registered
Hapi is a registered broker dealer with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Comission [**(SEC)**](https://hapi.trade/<https:/www.sec.gov/>) and a member of the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority [**(FINRA)**](https://hapi.trade/<https:/www.finra.org/#/>) and the Securities Investor Protection Corporation [**(SIPC)**](https://hapi.trade/<https:/www.sipc.org/>).
**0 Broker Commissions**
Buy and sell stocks without paying commissions.Plus, Hapi has no account maintenance fees.
[Start](https://hapi.trade/<https:/app.hapi.trade/signup>)
Some fees may apply, click [Fee schedule](https://hapi.trade/<https:/hapi-public-documents.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/hapi-fees-schedule.pdf>) for more details.
### Investment**opportunities**
At Hapi, we want to give anyone in LATAM the opportunity to invest in the U.S. stock market in an easy, quick and secure way.
Sign up in minutes, deposit the funds you want, and start investing immediately.
[Start investing](https://hapi.trade/<https:/app.hapi.trade/signup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/667ba54755f67a48373474d0_Image.png)
Start investing
Current investors of Hapi:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666790f2ab2abbf50334ea4e/66bf11dece846a42bb253949_logo_ycombinator_ni0rw8.png)

All investments involve risk, including the loss of capital. Hapi offers self directed investment accounts for those investors who feel comfortable managing their own investments. For a full list of our disclosures, please visit our [disclosures ](https://hapi.trade/<https:/help.hapi.trade/en/articles/8982954-disclosures>)page.
Hapi Securities LLC is an SEC registered broker-dealer, a member of the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (“FINRA”) (CRD number 311868), and Securities Investor Protection Corporation (“SIPC”), which protects securities of its members customers for up to US$ 500,000 (including US$ 250,000 in cash). For additional information visit [SIPC.](https://hapi.trade/<https:/www.sipc.org/>) Please note, SIPC covers the return of your securities should Hapi become insolvent, not against the decline of your securities. Click [here](https://hapi.trade/<https:/help.hapi.trade/en/articles/8982954-disclosures>) for Hapi’s form CRS, which describes Hapi’s products and services.
Hapi is a company incorporated and operated in the United States of America. It is the client's responsibility to ascertain the legal requirements that the current legal framework applicable in its country of residence establishes about the services provided by Hapi, as well as to ascertain whether the current legal framework applicable in its country of residence allows using the services provided by Hapi. When you use Hapi you are operating in the United States of America. This is not an offer, solicitation of an offer, or advice to buy or sell securities, or open a brokerage account in any jurisdiction where Hapi is not registered, or Hapi’s operations contravene local laws.
Hapi offers commission free trading. However, certain fees may apply to certain products, operations and investments. Please refer to our full [Fee schedule.](https://hapi.trade/<https:/hapi-public-documents.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/hapi-fees-schedule.pdf>)
Cryptocurrency execution and custody services are provided by Bakkt Crypto Solutions LLC through a software licensing agreement between Bakkt Crypto Solutions LLC and Hapi Crypto LLC. Cryptocurrency trading is offered through an account with Bakkt Crypto. Bakkt Crypto is not a registered broker-dealer or FINRA member and your cryptocurrency holdings are not FDIC or SIPC insured. Please make sure you fully understand the [risk](https://hapi.trade/<https:/hapi-public-documents.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/apex-crypto-risk-disclosures.pdf>) involved before trading.

Hapi offers commission free trading. However, certain fees may apply to certain products, operations and investments. Please refer to our full Fee schedule.⟨12⟩
Cryptocurrency execution and custody services are provided by Bakkt Crypto Solutions LLC through a software licensing agreement between Bakkt Crypto Solutions LLC and Hapi Crypto LLC. Cryptocurrency trading is offered through an account with Bakkt Crypto. Bakkt Crypto is not a registered broker-dealer or FINRA member and your cryptocurrency holdings are not FDIC or SIPC insured. Please make sure you fully understand the risk⟨34⟩ involved before trading.

generated_description:
**Hapi: Democratizing Investment in Latin America**

Founded in 2020 and graduated from Y Combinator Batch W21, Hapi is carving out its niche in the fintech landscape by offering a zero-commission trading app for stocks and cryptocurrencies, specifically designed for users in Latin America.

**Mission and Vision**  
Hapi’s mission is straightforward: make it easy for anyone in Latin America to invest in stocks, ETFs, and crypto without hefty fees or minimum investments. With just five minutes to get started and no minimum balances required, Hapi empowers users to dive into investing, regardless of their financial situation. 

**Platform Features**  
- **Zero Commissions**: Users can buy and sell stocks and ETFs without incurring commissions, making it easier for first-time investors to engage with the market. 
- **Low Entry Point**: Investors can start with as little as $5, allowing access to fractional shares and ETFs.
- **Instant Deposits**: Transferring funds into the Hapi platform is quick and secure, enhancing the user experience.

**Product Offering**  
Hapi users gain access to a wide array of investment opportunities, including 17 different cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Dogecoin. The platform operates under the regulatory oversight of the SEC, FINRA, and SIPC, ensuring a level of security and compliance that instills confidence in its users.

**Company Status and Future Directions**  
With a growing team of 45 employees, Hapi is scaling quickly to meet the needs of its customer base in Latin America. The company is supported by a range of investors including notable names in venture capital.

For more details or to start investing, you can visit their website: [Hapi](https://hapi.trade/).

In short, Hapi is not just a trading platform; it's a movement towards making investment accessible and manageable for millions in LATAM, breaking down barriers that have historically kept many from building investment portfolios. So, whether you're a seasoned trader or just dipping your toes into investing, Hapi invites you to join in—without the costly play.
